dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 298 IH: To eliminate certain limitations and exclusions regarding defense articles and requirements regarding security assistance and sales with respect to the Republic of Cyprus.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Malliotakis (for herself, Ms. Titus, Mr. Bilirakis, and Mr. Pappas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To eliminate certain limitations and exclusions regarding defense articles and requirements regarding security assistance and sales with respect to the Republic of Cyprus.

section.header: Elimination of requirements concerning the Republic of Cyprus

subsection.header: Elimination of limitations and exclusions regarding defense articles
subsection.text: Section 1250A of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 (22 U.S.C. 2373 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading, by striking Repeal of prohibition on and inserting Sense of Congress regarding;
in subsection (a), by striking (a) Sense of Congress.—It is the sense of Congress that— and inserting the following:

quoted-block.quoted-block-continuation-text: It is the sense of Congress that—

subsection.header: Elimination of requirements regarding security assistance and certain sales
subsection.text: Section 620C of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 (22 U.S.C. 2373) is amended by striking subsections (d) and (e).
